attributes.action: Encourage the police to crack down on "lane hogs".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Drivers who inappropiately drive in the overtaking lane(s), when not overtaking, on motorways and other roads, annoy all of us, and seems especially bad in roadworks.

It could easily be dealt with under "Driving without due care".

By addressing itself to this problem, the government would increase its, and the police's, popularity at a stroke.
